mapper.update:
UPDATE cms_page_cfg
cms_page_id = #{cmsPageId},
cms_cfg_value_code = #{cmsCfgValueCode},
text_value = #{textValue},
cms_cfg_key_id = #{cmsCfgKeyId},
banner_id = #{bannerId},

update_time = #{updateTime},
parent_id = #{parentId},
WHERE id = #{id}
